ComicInfo.Series: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong
ComicInfo.Summary: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong [Part 5]: The heroes try to prevent an underwater battle between Godzilla and Camazotz from destroying Atlantis. Batman is joined by his allies and the Titans to build a weapon to use against the monsters. On Skull Island, Green Arrow discovers the League of Assassins have plans for one of the monsters, while Grodd seeks to control Kong. Feeling guilt over his role in Superman's injuries, Shazam single-handedly takes on the Legion of Doom and their allies.
